messages.msgSnippet: do you mean the Soga-brothers?its a classic tale of revenge..like chusingura.takes place in heian-era when soga brothers revenge their fathers
messages.messageBody:
do you mean the Soga-brothers?its a classic tale of revenge..like chusingura.takes place in heian-era when soga brothers revenge their fathers death...sorry,dont have any link for that...Jore



To: samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com

Date: Mon, 2 Mar 2009 03:32:23 +0000
Subject: [samuraihistory] another help request





Can anyone provide any further information on the sozo clan/brothers
mentioned in the book Code of Bushido? They eemed to embody the true
samurai spirit even though they were not high ranking samurai. I also
believe there is a japanesemovie about them..

thanks
Paul
